alignment: Extend back leg parallel to floor
Arms can be forward, at sides, or in prayer
Keep standing leg strong and straight
breathing: Steady, focused breathing. Breathe into your core.
modifications: Use wall for support, or keep back foot on ground (warrior III prep)

alignment: From triangle pose, bend front knee
Place hand on floor or block
Lift back leg parallel to floor
Gaze can be down or up
breathing: Breathe deeply, finding stability in the pose
modifications: Use block under bottom hand, or practice at wall

alignment: From triangle pose, bring opposite hand to floor or block
breathing: Breathe into the twist, allowing it to deepen with each exhale
modifications: Use block under hand, or practice with bent front knee
